item.description:
Quick walkthrough in Phonegap 101.

Building with JQuery Mobile.

Trying out the Sencha Touch framework.
item.why:
Apps can be used to have the same experience using JQuery.
JQuery allows users the ability to build a universal app for the iphone, android, and tablet platforms, as well as the web.

group.name: Boston jQuery - Rich Internet Application (RIA) Development
